title: (x) Sans Serif from Ghost Box records artwork - please ID! - Monotype Grotesque {Mike Y}
content:
at first glance i thought this was helvetica, then berthold akzidenz, then univers, then arial, but it doesn't seem to be any of those...  
can anyone help?  
it seems Ghost Box use this font on all their releases and flyers.... i think they are all designed by Julian House (who is associated with Intro Design ).....anyway, can anyone help?????????  
thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120103170034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ghostbox3_5136.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120103170034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ghostbox6_5088.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120103170034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ghostbox10_5936.jpg)
author: neill k

comments.content:
yep thats it!  
thanks very much Mike!!!!!!!
